name: Caipirinha with mint
description: Caipirinha is a Brazilian cocktail prepared with cachaça, cane sugar, and lime. But, you can add mint leaves and make their flavor refreshing.
directions: Cut the lemon 8 pieces and remove the white layer that holds the segments.
Spread the mint leaves over the edge of the cup.
Add the lemon, mint, sugar and massere to the shaker. Add ice and cachaça and mix.
